short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize a text selection with Chat-GPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing our new browser extension, which uses ChatGPT, a cutting-edge language model, to summarize selected text on web pages. This powerful extension allows you to quickly and easily get the gist of lengthy articles or documents without having to read every single word.

To use the extension, simply highlight the text you want to summarize, right-click on it, and select "Summarize Text." Within seconds, our extension will analyze the text using natural language processing and generate a concise summary that captures the most important points.

With this extension, you'll never have to waste time reading long articles or documents again. Whether you're conducting research, reading news articles, or simply browsing the web, our extension will help you quickly and efficiently extract the key information you need.

Our extension is easy to install and works seamlessly with all major web browsers. Plus, it's free to use, so you can start summarizing text right away without any additional cost. Give it a try and see how it can help you save time and improve your productivity today!
